data.title: Proven Success – The Robertson Law Group
data.meta_description: View our current cases and published opinions.
data.text:
Proven Success

Currently Serving as Appellate Counsel

Review pending cases where the Robertson Law Group currently serves as appellate counsel in the appellate courts.

Schultz v. Great Plains Trucking, SC100582 (pending transfer request in the Missouri Supreme Court)

Brummett v. Jefferson City Medical Group, P.C., WD86589 (pending time for filing transfer request in the Missouri Supreme Court)
